title: New: White Birds – I Had a Dream I Did Everything Right
body:
Photo by _[Tamar Burduli](http://www.flickr.com/photos/tburdeau)_

So I’ve been a really shitty person to the people I care about the most for some time now. I’ve been drinking too much, saying things that I don’t mean, and pushing everyone who I care about the most in my life as far away from me as possible. This is my apology. I’m getting my shit together. I love you all. You know who you are. – James Harvey

Says it all really. The new track from **[White Birds](https://soundcloud.com/white-birds)** ladies and gentlemen.
